questions.question: What is a table in a word processor?
options: A grid of rows and columns
questions.explanation: A table is a grid made up of rows and columns.

questions.question: Which menu is commonly used to insert a table in MS Word?
questions.explanation: The Insert menu is used to add tables.

questions.question: What is the intersection of a row and a column called?
questions.explanation: The intersection is called a cell.

questions.question: How can you add a new row to an existing table?
questions.explanation: Right-clicking gives options to insert rows.

questions.question: Which option is used to merge two or more cells in a table?
questions.explanation: Merge Cells combines selected cells.

questions.question: How do you split a single cell into multiple cells?
questions.explanation: Split Cells divides a cell into more cells.

questions.question: Which tool is used to change the border style of a table?
questions.explanation: Borders and Shading changes table borders.

questions.question: How can you delete a column from a table?
questions.explanation: Right-clicking gives the option to delete columns.

questions.question: Which shortcut inserts a new table in MS Word?
questions.explanation: Alt + N, T opens the Insert Table dialog.

questions.question: What is the default alignment of text in a table cell?
questions.explanation: Text is usually aligned top left by default.

questions.question: How can you change the width of a column?
questions.explanation: Dragging the border changes column width.

questions.question: Which feature allows you to add color to table cells?
questions.explanation: Shading adds background color to cells.

questions.question: How do you select an entire row in a table?
options: Click to the left of the row
questions.explanation: Clicking to the left selects the whole row.

questions.question: Which option is used to combine two tables into one?
questions.explanation: Removing the space merges two tables.

questions.question: How can you add a table caption in MS Word?
questions.explanation: Insert Caption is under the References tab.

questions.question: Which option is used to sort data in a table?
questions.explanation: The Sort option is found under Layout.

questions.question: How can you convert text to a table?
options: Insert > Table > Convert Text to Table
questions.explanation: Convert Text to Table is under Insert > Table.

questions.question: Which option is used to repeat a table heading on each page?
questions.explanation: Repeat Header Rows repeats headings on each page.

questions.question: How do you move a table to a different location in the document?
questions.explanation: Dragging the table handle moves the table.

questions.question: Which option is used to auto-fit the contents of a table?
questions.explanation: AutoFit adjusts the size to fit contents.

questions.question: How can you insert a formula in a table cell?
questions.explanation: The Formula option is under Layout.

questions.question: Which option is used to split a table into two?
questions.explanation: Split Table divides a table into two.

questions.question: How do you select an entire table?
questions.explanation: The move handle selects the whole table.

questions.question: Which option is used to remove all borders from a table?
questions.explanation: No Border removes all borders from the table.

questions.question: How can you add a new column to the right of an existing column?
questions.explanation: Right-clicking gives the option to insert columns.

questions.question: Which option is used to align text vertically in a cell?
questions.explanation: Cell Alignment changes vertical alignment.

questions.question: How do you delete an entire table?
questions.explanation: Selecting and pressing Delete removes the table.

questions.question: Which option is used to add a diagonal line in a cell?
questions.explanation: Diagonal Border adds a diagonal line.

questions.question: How can you quickly move to the next cell in a table?
questions.explanation: Tab moves to the next cell.

questions.question: Which feature allows you to repeat the last action in a table?
questions.explanation: F4 repeats the last action.
